sqlMap.select: SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _fs_act t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_act t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,(SELECT COALESCE(x.code,'') ||'/'|| COALESCE(x.abbr,'') FROM sys_corporation x where x.id = t.corpid) AS corper ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.starter and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.starter) AS startername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY isbase , code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM fs_period t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY period LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_period t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _fs_xrate t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY currencyfm
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_xrate t WHERE $qry$

SELECT * ,(CASE WHEN dir = '+' THEN '借' WHEN dir = '-' THEN '贷' END) AS dirdesc ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(x.oamt),0) AS damt FROM _fs_vch x WHERE x.srctype = 'I' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM fs_actset zz WHERE zz.id = x.actsetid AND zz.startyear = x.year) AND x.period = 0 AND x.actsetid = c.actsetid AND x.cyid = '$cyid$' AND c.id = x.actid) AS oamt1
,f_amtto_glp(c.actsetid , (SELECT CAST((COALESCE(x.startyear,2014)||'-'||COALESCE(x.startperiod , 1)||'-01') AS DATE) FROM fs_actset x WHERE x.id = c.actsetid AND x.isdelete = FALSE),'$cyid$',(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(x.oamt),0) AS damt FROM _fs_vch x WHERE x.srctype = 'I' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM fs_actset zz WHERE zz.id = x.actsetid AND zz.startyear = x.year) AND x.period = 0 AND x.actsetid = c.actsetid AND x.cyid = '$cyid$' AND c.id = x.actid)) AS damt5
,(CASE WHEN c.isastypeb = true then 'A' when c.isastypec = true then 'B' when c.isastyped = true then 'C' when c.isastypee = true then 'E' END) AS astype FROM _fs_act c WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_act c WHERE $qry$

SELECT xx.id ,(CASE WHEN dir = '+' THEN '借' WHEN dir = '-' THEN '贷' END) AS dirdesc ,(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(x.oamt),0) AS damt FROM _fs_vch x WHERE x.srctype = 'I' AND x.astid = xx.id AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM fs_actset zz WHERE zz.id = x.actsetid AND zz.startyear = x.year) AND x.period = 0 AND x.actsetid = c.actsetid AND x.cyid = '$cyid$' AND c.id = x.actid) AS oamt1
,xx.code AS astcode ,xx.name AS astname FROM fs_act c , fs_ast xx , fs_astype yy WHERE $qry$ $filter$ AND xx.astypeid = yy.id AND c.actsetid = xx.actsetid AND c.actsetid = yy.actsetid AND c.isdelete = FALSE AND xx.isdelete = FALSE AND yy.isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY xx.code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_act c , fs_ast xx , fs_astype yy WHERE $qry$ $filter$ AND xx.astypeid = yy.id AND c.actsetid = xx.actsetid AND c.actsetid = yy.actsetid AND c.isdelete = FALSE AND xx.isdelete = FALSE AND yy.isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$
SELECT * FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$

SELECT * ,(SELECT d.name FROM sys_department d , sys_user su WHERE d.id = su.deptid AND su.code = t.code AND su.namec= t.name AND su.isdelete = false LIMIT 1) AS dptnamec ,(SELECT c.abbr FROM sys_corporation c , sys_user su WHERE c.id = su.corpid AND su.code = t.code AND su.namec= t.name AND su.isdelete = false LIMIT 1) AS cmpnamec FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$
SELECT * FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_ast t WHERE $qry$

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _fs_acctrp t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY rptype , rpcode , cyid LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_acctrp t WHERE $qry$
SELECT * FROM sys_corporation a WHERE $qry$ AND a.isdelete = false ORDER BY a.namec DESC,a.code
SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM sys_corporation a WHERE $qry$ AND a.isdelete = false

SELECT * FROM( SELECT a.* ,(SELECT d.name FROM sys_department d WHERE d.id = a.deptid) AS dptnamec ,(SELECT c.abbr FROM sys_corporation c WHERE c.id = a.corpid) AS cmpnamec FROM sys_user a ) aa WHERE $qry$ AND aa.iscsuser = 'N' AND aa.isdelete = false $filter$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$

SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT a.* ,(SELECT d.name FROM sys_department d WHERE d.id = a.deptid) AS dptnamec ,(SELECT c.abbr FROM sys_corporation c WHERE c.id = a.corpid) AS cmpnamec FROM sys_user a ) aa
WHERE $qry$ AND aa.iscsuser = 'N' AND aa.isdelete = false $filter$ ) bb
SELECT * FROM _sys_department a WHERE $qry$ AND a.isdelete = false $filter$ ORDER BY company , code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT count(*) AS counts FROM _sys_department a WHERE $qry$ AND a.isdelete = false $filter$
SELECT * FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM _fs_vchtype t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fs_vchtype t WHERE $qry$ ;

SELECT * ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.inputer) AS inputername ,COALESCE((SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1),t.updater) AS updatername FROM fs_vchdesc t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY code LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_vchdesc t WHERE $qry$ ;
SELECT * ,(SELECT COALESCE(x.code,'') ||'/'|| COALESCE(x.abbr,'') FROM sys_corporation x where x.id = t.corpid) AS corper FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY isbase , code
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM fs_actset t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE
